name: Denim School Girl
description: A throwback to her earlier days.
alt: Naomi wearing a denim school girl jacket, grey patterned skirt, and her hair in pigtails.

name: Dragon Queen
description: Her powers actually come from a pact with an eldritch being, but drawing on a draconic bloodline is still well within her domain.
alt: Naomi wearing an orange dress with a red scaled skirt, winged ankle cuffs, and horns.

name: Snowy Sweater
description: The pattern is cute, but the outfit isn't actually that warm.
alt: Naomi wearing a blue sweater with a white snowflake pattern, a blue plaid miniskirt, and blue tights with a snowflake design.

name: Company Jumpsuit
alt: Naomi wearing the jumpsuit from Lethal Company.
